name: Scramble Portal
flavorText: You alter the configuration of a teleportation circle or other portal so others cannot travel through it.
text: Scramble Portal allows you to alter the magic of a permanent portal, making it malfunction. For the ritual’s duration, the portal sends creatures passing through it to a random destination (DM’s discretion).  At the completion of the ritual, make a Arcana check. The result determines how long the portal remains scrambled.
